projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce website with user authentication, product management, and payment integration. Built using MERN stack.

projects.title: Class 11 Programs
projects.description: This has most of the programs that a basic Python student would need to learn. It has programs on basic data structures, file handling, and more.

projects.title: Class 12 Programs
projects.description: This repository contains all the programs that I wrote in my class 12th Python project. It has programs on simple algorithms, MySQL, and Tkinter and more.

projects.title: Leetcode Problems
projects.description: This repository contains all the Leetcode problems I've solved and my understanding of them. Why this exercise, you may ask? I found solving problems and then forgetting about them quite pointless; it felt like I was just chasing the number of questions solved. So, in an attempt to remember how each problem was solved and to help others, I have created this repository.

projects.title: Traffic Lights Controller
projects.description: A basic application of verilog, this project is a traffic lights controller that uses a finite state machine to control the lights.
